Well, according to a statement from the interior ministry and Saudi officials quoted in both state-run and independent media, security teams moved in on two buildings in different parts of Riyadh at dawn today.

The government says five militants were killed.
Officials suspect they had some involvement in last Friday's bomb attempt at the Abqaiq refinery.
